frozen.name: joplin-desktop
frozen.shortDescription: An open source note taking and to-do application with synchronisation capabilities
frozen.longDescription:
Joplin is a free, open source note taking and to-do application, which can
handle a large number of notes organised into notebooks. The notes are
searchable, can be copied, tagged and modified either from the
applications directly or from your own text editor. The notes are in
Markdown format.
